typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		{ Name} as string,
		{ salary} as string,
		{ Date} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	wildcardPaths:['SchemaDrift/Source/*.csv']) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Id as string,
		Name as string,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	filePattern:(concat("file_", toString(currentDate() ))),
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
